sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"地区"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: district, region, area, section, zone, belt, quarter, neighbourhood
means: district ： 多指由政府等机构出于行政管理等目的而明确划分的地区。
region ： 普通用词，常指地球上、大气中具有自然分界线的区域，特指按照气候、人体或其他特征鲜明、自成一体的地区。
area ： 普通用词，指整体中较大的，界线不分明的一部分。
section ： 普通用词，指城市、国家或天然界线形成的地区。
zone ： 科技用词，指圆形或弧形地带，尤指地图上按温度划分的五个地带。用作一般意义时，也可指具有某种特征的其它地区。
belt ： 从本义"带，带状物"引申而指任何广阔的长条地带，也可指种植某种作物的地区。
quarter ： 指城市里具有相同性质或独特风味的地区，比section范围小，但划分更精确。
neighbourhood ： 指比section的划定更清楚，范围更小。具体指城市中的住宅区，也可指附近一带。

word_mean: ［拉］〔复areae或areas〕区：局限的空间，解剖学命名中用以表示特定表面或功能区的通称。另见region项下

means.word_mean: 地面；平地，空地；地基，宅基，屋基
(房子、地区、城市中划作特殊用途或具有特征的)地方；区；场；场地
【解剖学】区，(如有机体的或大脑皮层的)一部分

entry.def: An area is a particular part of a town, a country, a region, or the world.

example.ex: ...the large number of community groups in the area...
60 years ago half the French population still lived in rural areas.
example.tran: 60年前有一半法国人仍然生活在乡村地区。

entry.def: Your area is the part of a town, country, or region where you live. An organization's area is the part of a town, country, or region that it is responsible for.

example.ex: Local authorities have been responsible for the running of schools in their areas...
example.tran: 地方当局一直负责管理本地区的学校。

example.ex: If there is an election in your area, you should go and vote.
example.tran: 如果你所居住的地区进行选举，你应该去参加投票。

entry.def: A particular area is a piece of land or part of a building that is used for a particular activity.

example.ex: ...the main check-in area located in Terminal 1.
example.tran: 位于1号候机厅的主检票区

entry.def: An area is a particular place on a surface or object, for example on your body.
entry.tran: （某一表面或物体上的）区；（身体上的）部分

example.ex: You will notice that your baby has two soft areas on the top of his head.
example.tran: 你会注意到你的宝宝头顶上有两处柔软的地方。

entry.def: The area of a surface such as a piece of land is the amount of flat space or ground that it covers, measured in square units.

example.ex: The islands cover a total area of 625.6 square kilometers...
example.tran: 这些岛屿总面积为625.6平方公里。

example.ex: Although large in area, the flat did not have many rooms.
example.tran: 这套公寓虽然面积很大，但并没有太多房间。

entry.def: You can use area to refer to a particular subject or topic, or to a particular part of a larger, more general situation or activity.

example.ex: ...the politically sensitive area of old age pensions.
example.tran: 有关养老金的政治敏感话题

example.ex: ...the internationalization of the economy and all other areas of society...
example.tran: 社会的经济和其他领域的国际化

entry.def: On a football pitch, the area is the same as the penalty area.

means.word_mean: 1. a particular geographical region of indefinite boundary (usually serving some special purpose or distinguished by its people or culture or geography);
2. a particular environment or walk of life;

sentences.sentence: "it was a closed area of employment"

means.word_mean: 4. a part of a structure having some specific characteristic or function;

sentences.sentence: "the spacious cooking area provided plenty of room for servants"

means.word_mean: 5. a part of an animal that has a special function or is supplied by a given artery or nerve;
6. the extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary;

sentences.sentence: "it was about 500 square feet in area"

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'space allocated for a specific purpose'): from Latin, literally vacant piece of level ground'
